name: Marilith
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.Magic Resistance: The marilith has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
traits.Magic Weapons: The marilith's weapon attacks are magical.
traits.Reactive: The marilith can take one reaction on every turn in combat.

actions.Multiattack: The marilith can make seven attacks: six with its longswords and one with its tail.
actions.Longsword: Melee Weapon Attack: +9+1d10 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.
actions.Tail: Melee Weapon Attack: +9+1d10 + 4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 19+1d10 + 14). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, the marilith can automatically hit the target with its tail, and the marilith can't make tail attacks against other targets.
actions.Teleport: The marilith magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.
